author: sussman
msg: Code cleanup, followup to issue 838 fix: remove an old hack.

author: philip
msg: Add a --config-dir option that allows a user's config to be read from
a directory other than the default ~/.subversion.
svn_config_write_auth_data): Add config_dir parameter to override
(log_do_merge): Removed the call to svn_config_get_config which seems
like a leftover from ancient times.
(get_category_config): Added the config_dir param and made it override
the other directories in case it is set.
(svn_config_get_config): Added the config_dir param and passed it to
(svn_config_read_auth_data): Added and implemented the config_dir param.
(svn_config_write_auth_data): Added and implemented the config_dir param.
(get_creds): Read the config_dir from the parameters and passed it to
(save_creds): Added the config_dir param and passed it to
(simple_save_creds): Read the config_dir from the parameters
(username_save_creds): Read the config_dir from the parameters
(options_table): Add "--config-dir" to create command. Tweak help text
to fit in 80 columns and remove some '.'s for consistency.
(main): Added the processing of the config_dir option.
(subcommand_create): added the config_dir param to svn_config_get_config
(main): Added processing of the svn_cl__config_dir_opt; passed
config_dir to svn_config_get_config and set its paramter in svn_auth.
the user's config doesn't affect the tests.  Raise the correct exception.

author: cmpilato
msg: More pickiness from the C-Mike regarding test strings.
(TestCase._check_name): Disallow test strings that are capitalized.
(do_test_num): Do the same nifty test-string validation for the C
tests that we do for the Python tests (50 characters or fewer, no
terminating periods, no capitalized first characters, please).

author: sussman
msg: Fix issue #838 and issue #1319:  Stop calling svn_client_copy()
whenever 'svn merge' adds a file or directory.  Use svn_wc_add()
with copyfrom args instead.  Make some related code cleaner.
[In an upcoming cleanup commit: removal of bogus adm_access arg to
svn_client_copy, and possible removal of diff_cmd_baton's revnum fields.]
dir_added() callbacks take revnums, just like file_changed().
revnum args.  Stop calling svn_client_copy().  Create the dir (or
install the new file) and call svn_wc_add() with copyfrom args.
(diff_file_added): use the passed-in revs, rather than the ones in
* libsvn_client/repos_diff.c (close_file): pass 0 and a real revnum to
Add pass the correct notification signal, so we don't get extra
* libsvn_wc/adm_ops.c (svn_wc_add): when scheduling a dir for
addition-with-history, undo the default 'incomplete' flag created by
* merge_tests.py (add_with_history):  make this test expect reasonable
